<bsdf type="phong" >

groundShadingXml:
<bsdf type="twosided" >

<bsdf type="roughdiffuse">
  <float name="alpha" value="0.7" />
  <rgb name="reflectance" value="#444444" />
</bsdf>
</bsdf>
